mapper.sql: id, space_name, parent_id, level, operator, operate_time, remark
mapper.insert: insert into space (id, space_name, parent_id, level, operator, operate_time, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into space
id,
space_name,
parent_id,
level,
operator,
operate_time,
remark,

mapper.update:
update space
space_name = #{spaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update space set space_name = #{spaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select COUNT(1) from Space where parent_id=#{parentid} AND space_name=#{parentName}
